ygData.subject: RE: RE: Simply Charming...
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah, okay.  Talking about 2 different efreeti s here.  First one is in Sol A - The Reckless Efreeti, and drops the Obsidian Flamberge and Platinum Armband.
ygData.messageBody:
Ah, okay. Talking about 2 different efreeti's here. First one is in Sol A
- The Reckless Efreeti, and drops the Obsidian Flamberge and Platinum
Armband. Pretty easy for a level 30 group to get to.
Second efreeti is the Efreeti Lord Djarn in Sol B. Drops the Golden Efreeti
Boots and a +agi/HP ring. He's the one that's a royal pain to get to.


Elwyn Heartstring
Level 50 Bard of Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: John_Senior@... [mailto:John_Senior@...]
Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 11:56 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Simply Charming...


From: John_Senior@...

Hmm, I don't understand. How does this level 30 bard get to the efreeti
with a group of 6? He sounds all tooooo tough for a group of 30's.
